task.title: Opening a previous revision in the editor
task.shortdesc: You can inspect the content of a previously commited file by opening it in a new read-only editor tab.

step.cmd: From the view, open the history of the current branch or one of the files in the staging area.
In the commit log panel, select the commit that you want to see the details of.
In the commited changes panel, right click-click a file and click Open.
